altername_name: Sumikko Gurashi Oheya no Sumi de Tabi Kibun Sugoroku
name: The Corner Buddies are Here! Corner Partner Town
overview: Create a warm town where you can get together for the corner friends!◇You can freely configure buildings in a vast space, and you can enjoy your own original construction town. You can build houses, bookstores, fish shops and other shops where your friends in the corner live. In addition, tree planting, flower beds, fountains, etc. are also prepared.The corner buddies are here!
